# Load Package
```{r}
library(pracma)

```


# f(x) = 1/(1-x)
```{r}
f1 <- function(x) { 1 / (1 - x) }
a1 <- 0
n1 <- 5
taylor(f1,a1,n1)




```

# f(x) = e^x
```{r}
f1 <- function(x) { exp(x) }
a1 <- 0
n1 <- 5
taylor(f1,a1,n1)


```

# f(x) = ln(1 + x)
```{r}
f1 <- function(x) { log(1 + x) }
a1 <- 0
n1 <- 5
taylor(f1,a1,n1)



```
# f(x) = x^(1/2)
```{r}
f1<- function(x) { x^1/2 }
a1 <- 0
n1 <- 4
taylor(f1,a1,n1)


```
